game.name: Strinova
game.genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Trading Cards, Captions available, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 스트리노바는 애니메이션 스타일 3인칭 대전 슈팅 게임입니다. 3차원과 2차원을 자유롭게 넘나들며 다른 게임과 차별화된 스트리노바의 독특한 전투 시스템과 박진감 넘치는 플레이를 경험해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Strinova is an anime-style third-person tactical competitive shooter. Switch freely between three-dimensional and two-dimensional forms in this one-of-a-kind game that offers a unique tactical shooting system for an unparalleled experience.

reviewHighlights.text: Its been almost a 1000 hours.. and i could easily tell why i like this game and why i hoped it was much more. Back in November Last Year i found this...
Strinova community and developer team. I know you won't read this but Merry Christmas and God bless every single one of you that read this review. Als...
